recipe_text: Quantity; 680; Prepare 680 grams of beef sirloin, thinly sliced| Measurement; 60; Measure out 60 grams of soy sauce| Measurement; 30; Measure out 30 grams of lemon juice| Measurement; 10; Measure out 10 grams of sugar| Measurement; 10; Measure out 10 grams of garlic, minced| Quantity; 150; Prepare 150 grams of onion, sliced| Measurement; 30; Measure out 30 grams of vegetable oil| Measurement; 5; Measure out 5 grams of salt| Measurement; 2; Measure out 2 grams of black pepper| Untimed; None; In a bowl, combine soy sauce, lemon juice, sugar, garlic, salt, and black pepper| Untimed; None; Add beef slices to the marinade and toss to coat| Untimed; None; Cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour| Untimed; None; Heat vegetable oil in a skillet over medium heat| Untimed; None; Add marinated beef and cook until browned| Timed; 300; Cook beef for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally| Untimed; None; Add onion slices and cook until softened| Finish; None; Serve hot!
title: Filipino Beef Steak
